name: roles-subgraph
author: orium.network
description: A set of subgraphs (one for each network) for Orium Network dapps

scripts.codegen-goerli: cp addresses-goerli.ts src/utils/addresses.ts && cp subgraph-goerli.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen subgraph-goerli.yaml
scripts.test-goerli: cp subgraph-goerli.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph test goerli
